  25 """
  26 yarg(1) -- A semi hard Cornish cheese, also queries PyPI
  27 ========================================================
  28 
  29 Yarg is a PyPI client.
  30 
  31     >>> import yarg
  32     >>>
  33     >>> package = yarg.get("yarg")
  34     >>> package.name
  35     u'yarg'
  36     >>> package.author
  37     Author(name=u'Kura', email=u'kura@kura.io')
  38     >>>
  39     >>> yarg.newest_packages()
  40     [<Package yarg>, <Package gray>, <Package ragy>]
  41     >>>
  42     >>> yarg.latest_updated_packages()
  43     [<Package yarg>, <Package gray>, <Package ragy>]
  44 
  45 Full documentation is at <https://yarg.readthedocs.org>.
  46 """
  47 
  48 
  49 from .client import get
  50 from .exceptions import HTTPError
  51 from .package import json2package
  52 from .parse import (newest_packages, latest_updated_packages)
  53 
  54 
  55 __all__ = ['get', 'HTTPError', 'json2package', 'newest_packages',
  56            'latest_updated_packages', ]
